colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I DONG BA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANGS BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR GZHUNG LUGS DU MA LA SPOB PA MCHOG TU REG BA RAB 'BYAMS SMRAS PA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL TE HAR CHEN THU MED KYIS CHAR GSAR RTZOM BGYIS PA ZHIG YOD KYANG DER BSGRAL LAS KYI RIM PA MA TSANG BRTEN PHYIS SU MDZO DGE STOD NAS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS CHA TSANG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SNGA MA LA BSGYUR 'GOD PHRAN BU DANG, KHA SBYAR DBYE BA'I SKOR YANG KHA BSKANG TE, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,LEGS SO,, ,,)
